title: FS SGC & PSA graded t206 commons and stars
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: FS SGC & PSA graded t206 commons and stars
posts.post_content:
Same ones I listed 3 weeks ago raw but this time Sgc graded.  Priority goes to multiple card offers.  Ask for scans if you want and include you e-mail address.  Payment by Paypal gift or money owed.
  
Name                       grade/back      cost


Westlake                      3 P               $100

Overall portrait               4 P             $60
Birmingham                   4.5 SC          $100
Mike Mitchell                  4.5 SC          $65
Ferris                             4.5 P             $65
Perring                          4.5 P              $65
Rhoades arm out           4.5 P             $90

Dygert                            5 P               $90

Cy Young glove shows    6                  $2000

    PSA graded

Orth                                 5mc P           $100
Stark                                4  P              $190
Doolan fielding                 6mc P           $75

Doug,

PM was sent on a couple.

Best,

Andy
